roleset.name: die, expire, dead
roleset.note: PERISH-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from perish.01-v)
PERISHED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, perish-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls disappearance-48.2. (from perished.01-j)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: If the Straits Foundation is willing [*-27] to know the details of this caseand sincerely understands the feelings of dependents of those who [*T*-28]perished , then it [*EXP*-29] isdifficult [*] to understand why it again sets up prerequisites [*T*-37] ?

example.name: arg0
example.text: I bet Soviet Union had no idea they 'd be perished in the late 80s - early 90s .

example.name: with CAU
example.text: Within this period, not less than one million of Cambodian people were perished of starvation, slavery, sickness and other arbitrary executions.
example.arg: not less than one million of Cambodia people
of starvation, slavery, sickness, and other arbitrary executions
